messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a sales company. Amir is the CEO of the company and has two senior managers under him: Wim and Raj. Wim has two salespersons reporting to him: Jing and Wei. Raj has two salespersons reporting to him: Nisha and Reza. Jing is donating 56 books and Wei is donating 22 books. Nisha is donating 10 books and Reza is donating 50 books. Assume you can pick one path to collect books.  From Amir, who should you meet with to get the maximum number of books? Please list the names in order, including Amir, separated by commas

I can offer some assistance! Amir to talk is not an excellent option of deciding because only three names are mentioned under him-Raj, WM, and him. Therefore my proposal is WM since Wj have more than twice as many people to contribute book-11, while Jing,Wim, and We contribute 3-5 plus Nisha, Reza adds 10 plus 5 so to talk with to give preference is Wim Answer: Wj,Jing', We and Ra 

Are their final answer correctly?   Kindly explain.

Now assume that you have been told that Jing, the salesperson under Wim, is not donating any books. Assume you can pick one path to collect books, from Amir, who should you meet with to get the maximum number of books? Please list the names in order, including Amir, separated by commas.

Ah, that eliminates one choice and changes the situation entirely due to the information that Ji'am is not donating any books since Wim now is the sole contributor, having only two sales-people as their donation while only half their donation makes me select Raj having 5 sales staff each contributing books including the CE  and Amj as viable sources since  both have more than twice of what  what Wi contributions can offer Answer: Amir, A Raj. The reason and conclusion of such order of visitation based on logical evaluation. All three names, the more donors available, plus Re are more than twice Jing' so it makes Wm is my last consideration before heading out to meet other donors who have less contribution potential in order to maximize output  to my collection efforts. 
Were their final answer correctly? Can their final answer logically deduced in terms of collectioin criteria used. Please give just explanation for final answer including the names visited first, secondly.   
Can the logical deduction by the AI  also list in numbers/quantites, book quantity to ensure maximized collection goals for optimal outcome?    

Am sure  the final answer are Raj, Ai. But pls explain stepwise along the specified visitation pattern using deductions in a precise explanation logcially
Pls highlight step  specific to collectiomn criteria to collect maximum books
